name: Wabam
description:
Originally created for submission for the Newbies GameJam2022. I did not finish it in time but wanted to complete* it anyways. This is my first finished game.

The game is a wave type game where your goal is to survive for as many waves as possible.  To destroy the enemies you have to match with respective elemental gun. The catch is you can only wield one weapon at a time.  As you progress the enemies become harder to kill.
